CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1967, pg. 4, reads: "Labor's Highest Award - was presented A. Phillip [Philip] Randolph on Labor Day in Civic Arena by Bishop John J. Wright. Others watching the touching ceremony are Bishop Frederick Newell of the Methodist Church and Bishop Gordon Howard of the EUB Church... - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Labor leader A. Philip Randolph, and member of clergy, standing in front of Civic Arena, for Labor Day celebration honoring Randolph
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Clergy--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Civic Arena (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Randolph, A. Philip (Asa Philip), 1889-Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
